```{r}
v1_usable |> select(Study, `FX*`, fxtas_dx) |> table(useNA = 'ifany') |> ftable()
```


```{r}
records_with_issues <- 
  v1_usable |>
  filter(
    Study %in% c("GP3", "GP4"),
    CGG >= 55,
    fxtas_dx |> is.na()
  ) |>
  select(`FXS ID`, `Event Name`, Study, CGG, 
         mds_fxtas_dx, new_mds_fxtas_dx, fxtas_dx)

records_with_issues
```

let's check one record at random:

```{r}
trax_gp34_all |>
  semi_join(records_with_issues, by = "FXS ID") |> 
  # filter(
  #   `FXS ID` == "100482-100"
  # ) |>
  select(`FXS ID`, `Event Name`, `Visit Date`, Study, CGG, 
         mds_fxtas_dx, new_mds_fxtas_dx, fxtas_dx, `FXTAS Stage`) |> 
  arrange(`FXS ID`, `Event Name`)
```

I checked several records of 100482-100; there was no fxtas dx value 
filled in before gp4 visit 2.
There are a lot of incomplete forms in their record.


```{r}
v1_usable |>
```
